Home » 30Vbh Vibhaṅgapāḷi » 1 Khandhavibhaṅga » 1.3 Pañhāpucchaka » 1.3.1 Tika
1.3.1.2 Vedanāttika
Khandhavibhaṅga
Pañhāpucchaka
Tika
Vedanāttika
501Dve khandhā na vattabbā—  “sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā”tipi, “dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttā”tipi, “adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā”tipi. Tayo khandhā siyā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā, siyā dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttā, siyā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā.
<< 1.3.1.1 Kusalattikaup1.3.1.3 Vipākattika >>
